# JoleDev - Joel López Verdugo

## About
Joel López Verdugo is a Full Stack Developer and Software Architect based in Ensenada, Baja California, Mexico. He specializes in building custom software solutions for businesses of any size — from startups to enterprises, in Mexico and worldwide.

## Services
- Custom website development
- Online stores (e-commerce)
- Mobile apps (iOS & Android)
- Administrative management systems
- SaaS platforms
- Inventory control systems
- Point of sale (POS) systems
- Automated billing and CFDI invoicing
- Bookings and appointment systems
- APIs and integrations
- Cloud infrastructure and DevOps
- AI integrations (WhatsApp bots, chatbots, automation)
- Consulting and software architecture
- Team training
- Software migration and modernization

## Location
Ensenada, Baja California, Mexico
Serves clients in Mexico and worldwide

## Contact
Website: https://joledev.com
Email: joel@joledev.com
Quote: https://joledev.com/es/cotizar
Schedule: https://joledev.com/es/agendar

## Technologies
TypeScript, Go, PHP, Python, Svelte, React, Astro, Flutter, React Native,
Docker, AWS, PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQLite, Node.js, Tailwind CSS, Three.js

## Languages
Spanish (native), English (professional)
